attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this petition to reduce the Taxi/Cab Car Insurance.

*-- Taxi Insurance is almost 15 time more than a normal car insurance which almost £3000 per year and it is a day light robbery.

*-- All Taxi/Cab drivers please support the good cause to reduce the unbelievably high price which we have to  pay.

*--Please forward this petition to all your Taxi/Cab driver fellows to make it work.
